name: Semantic UI
description: A frontend web development framework to build responsive layouts
summary: Semantic is a development framework that helps create beautiful, responsive layouts using human-friendly HTML.
features: A good amount of already developed components (+50)
Works with AngularJS, Ember and Meteor
scenario: When you want to design Beautiful Websites Quicker
When you want to use a semantic markup
When you need to develop a responsive website
When you need a set of consistent web components
